name: AND Democratie pour Azerbaidjan
memberOrga: Mostly members of AND are Azerbaijani political dissidents who came together to promote values of Human Rights, Democracy, and Rule of Law in Azerbaijan
goal: Support and promote democracy in Azerbaijan. Support for the families of political prisoners in Azerbaijan.
interests: Culture and media, Education and training, Energy, Enlargement, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Fraud prevention, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
Human Rights and Democracy
ENP, Eastern Partnership
Foreign Affairs
Energy policy
Fighting corruption
